name: DeleteShieldListById
description:
Delete a shield list using its ID.

Use this tool to delete a specific shield list by providing its ID. Ideal for managing and updating list configurations when a list is no longer needed.

parameters.name: shield_list_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the shield list to be deleted. Obtainable from the response of fetching all shield lists for the enterprise.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represents a shield list.
The ID for any Shield List can be determined by the response from the endpoint
fetching all shield lists for the enterprise.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.description:

The ID for any Shield List can be determined by the response from the endpoint

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
